ygData.subject: Re: Information on Lore Items and Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: Tergon s Spellbook is a quest item for an NPC in the gnome city..  Talk to the NPCs in the library. Two learn languages you have to find someone else that
ygData.messageBody:
Tergon's Spellbook is a quest item for an NPC in the gnome city.. Talk to
the NPCs in the library.


Two learn languages you have to find someone else that knows the langauge.
They can teach you it when you are grouped with them.

Lance

-----Original Message-----
From: Machesta [mailto:machesta@...]
Sent: Monday, May 24, 1999 5:29 AM
To: Fellow Adventurers
Subject: [EverQuest] Information on Lore Items and Languages


From: Machesta <machesta@...>

Fellow adventurers,

I come to you to seek knowledge from you on two questions.

1) Where can I find more information on lore items such as "Tergon's
Spellbook," "Staff Segment," "Mace Handle," and such. I have acquired
these lore items in my adventures, but have no idea what to do with
them.

2) I have read the tips provided thus far on gaining/improving
languages, but how do you improve one like combine language, elder tier
dal, old erudian, froglok, fraerie, gnoll, orc, or gaint without
spending a large amount of training points to improve. I have learned
many of the common languages by traveling with speakers of those
languages and exchanging training of one language for another.

Your assistance in these matters will be appreicated.

Findar (Bertoxxulous Server)
